name: Sugar Blast (itch) (Breda University of Applied Sciences, Emar180213, abigailpf, Xavier ten Hove, IceFish, David van der Waals, Elora180577, DayanaKotseva, MishGaga, Remco van de Ven, JordyDomenie, Odysseas Tsiridis, wizardenby, 2Darkness, Deyer4o, Jelle.Steinmann, RickPijpers, Roel Jansen, ShaneBreedveld, Lonixera, CherryRook, Marloes de Graaf, Robin Jansen E.S)
name_original: Sugar Blast (itch) (Breda University of Applied Sciences, Emar180213, abigailpf, Xavier ten Hove, IceFish, David van der Waals, Elora180577, DayanaKotseva, MishGaga, Remco van de Ven, JordyDomenie, Odysseas Tsiridis, wizardenby, 2Darkness, Deyer4o, Jelle.Steinmann, RickPijpers, Roel Jansen, ShaneBreedveld, Lonixera, CherryRook, Marloes de Graaf, Robin Jansen E.S)
description:
Sugar blast is a third-person shooter set in an overrun candy factory! Take up your boots and soda-pack as the monkey-mechanic and shoot your way through the waves of robots!

Sugar Blast is still in development, enjoy the early access build for now! 

  • WASD to move
  • Space to Jump / Soda-Pack boost
  • Shift to Soda-Dash
    • When pressing Shift you will dash in the direction you're currently moving. If pressing Shift while not moving, you'll dash straight upwards!
  • LMB to Shoot
  • RMB to use Alternate Shot
  • Esc to open the Menu
